ee asarthaka uthsahayen pasu nawatha ewan uthsahayak darana ladde 1960 ganan waladiya.ee mahanuwara chandra anagirathna mahatha ge niwese ras wu mahanuwara “kussiye mi sammelana“harahaya.nihadawa mi sammelanayata anugrahakathwaya labademin siti anagirathna mahatha ge sarama prana apayata gena ee mahatha lawa ma mara ninde siti pusa wa mahawali nadiyata damimata radikal miyan samath wiya.me pilibandawa sawisthara warthawak anagirathna mahatha wisin ma liya lada “nawina gajabinnalankaraya“ kruthiye dakwe.
